channel.title: Apache httpd version number is empty when i do nmap
channel.description: hi guys, why nmap doesn't show apache httpd ' version number ' !? if the admin of the ip that i'm nmapping to has decided to hide version number, is there any other way to find it? i'm using nmap 7.80 version ![2|690x416](upload://tWVXroRt40FJOke8rXVjaybIGxf.png)

item.title: Apache httpd version number is empty when i do nmap

item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: Apache httpd version number is empty when i do nmap

item.description:
hi guys,
why nmap doesn’t show apache httpd ’ version number ’ !?
if the admin of the ip that i’m nmapping to has decided to hide version number,
is there any other way to find it?
i’m using nmap 7.80 version
